name: PUPPERS
description: PUPPERS is a token inspired by PulseChain founder Richard Heart's beloved Chihuahua, Puppers. Puppers dealt with serious health complications due to heart disease and despite Richard's determination to seek the best care for her, she ultimately passed away in 2019. This token serves as a heartfelt tribute to Puppers' special place in Richard's life and the PulseChain community. It symbolizes the community's deep appreciation for longevity research, reflecting their support for advancing medical science to improve and elongate lifespans. In memory of a beloved companion who left pawprints on many hearts.
